content: summer market bag this bag is perfect for summer window-shopping and if you need a larger bag the size can be adjusted by simply increasing the number of foundation chains until the bag is the size you like the side shaping remains the same the bag just gets wider model shown is 11 inches wide and 10 5 inches tall materials peaches & cream 100 % worsted weight cotton 10 oz or 488 yds for model shown color #89 camel crochet hook size k or size to obtain gauge yarn needle approximately 60 small wooden beads optional gauge 4 double_crochet = 1 25 inches 2 double_crochet row = 1 25 inches abbreviations chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet round = round beg = beginning space = space yo = yarn over bpdc = back post double_crochet from the back of work insert hook under and around body of double_crochet yo and draw up a loop work as a normal double_crochet instructions if using beads string them onto yarn before starting chain beads can be pushed along yarn until you are ready to use them with k hook chain 31 round 1 2 double_crochet in fourth chain from hook double_crochet in each of next 26 chs 5 double_crochet in end chain rotate work to your right continuing along opposite side of chain double_crochet in next 26 chs 2 double_crochet in same chain as beg join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 do not turn on this and all following row unless instructed to do so 62 sts round 2 chain 3 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 24 sts 2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 24 sts 2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 70 sts round 3 chain 3 work bpdc in each st around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 70 sts rnds 4 6 chain 3 double_crochet in each st around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 round 7 chain 4 skip next st * double_crochet in next st skip next st chain 1 repeat from * around ending with slip_stitch in third chain of beg chain-4 if using beads add one bead every fourth double_crochet on every other round rnds 8 16 chain 4 skip chain-1 * double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 repeat from * around ending with slip_stitch in third chain of beg chain- 4 round 17 chain 3 double_crochet in each chain-1 space and double_crochet around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 70 sts round 18 chain 3 double_crochet in each double_crochet around join with slip_stitch to top of
